system.description: The character envelops a target's head in an element.
system.trigger: The target is grabbed with Elemental Grab.
system.effect: The character makes an Ego attack against the grabbed target's Resilience defense. If the attack is a success, the target takes regular damage. On a Fantastic success, the target can also be pinned and suffers the element's special effect. With elements that aren't suited to suffocation, this power chokes the target instead.
